## Description {#details}

This file defines the Fetch stage of an instruction pipeline.

Its sole purpose in life is to produce instructions for the rest of the pipeline.

<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Erase instructions up to the first that hasn&#39;t been retired.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((NumRetired &#42; 2) &gt;= Instructions.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
